quote_english: Yesterday whispers, today shouts, tomorrow sings.
Education isn't just a light; it's also a dance of shadows.
In learning, the heart and mind dance; without one, we stumble.
Fear halts a step, but passion propels it forward.
Curiosity is the seed; knowledge its root.
The end of learning is the soul's winter.
In our mistakes lies a forest, not just trees.
The best way to learn is to teach.
